content: Benoît, the assistant, greeted King Philippe with respect and loyalty, inquiring about his needs. When the king asked where they were, Benoît replied that they were in the Throne room of their castle in Isle-de-France. Upon the king's question about their purpose there, Benoît expressed their duty to serve the king and his kingdom, and he also checked on the king's well-being, noting that they were there to attend to the king's needs.
